item.title: The Recamán sequence
item.description: Take a look at the following sequence of numbers: \[0, 1, 3, 6, 2, 7, 13, 20, 12, 21, 11, 22, \ldots\] If you have not seen it before, you probably will not be able to figure out the pattern in this sequence. Si no la has visto nunca, seguramente no consigas averiguar qué patrón sigue esta secuencia. Se trata de la llamada secuencia de Recamán, atribuída al matemático colombiano Bernardo Recamán.
